longBusinessSummary: Golden Falcon Acquisition Corp. does not have significant operations. It focuses effecting a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses or entities. The company was incorporated in 2020 and is based in Newark, Delaware. Golden Falcon Acquisition Corp. operates as a subsidiary of Golden Falcon Sponsor Group, LLC.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. John M. Basnage de Beauval
companyOfficers.title: Gen. Counsel & Sec.
